name: Black Abyss
description:
This is a super fun puzzle game where a white balloon bounces rhythmically up and down.
During the bouncing process, it will encounter a reward ball or bomb. If the balloon collides with the reward ball, it will score. If it collides with the bomb, the game will fail. Players use the spacebar to keep the balloon floating in the air, adjust the position of the ball, and try to see how many points they can get!
